manifest:
#Means I can call any repo of https://github.com/Apon77 by calling apon.
#Means I can call any repo of https://github.com/zeelog by calling zeelog.
#Means I can call any repo of https://github.com/Nicklas373 by calling dicky.
#Here, project path="device/xiaomi/mido" means where tree will sync in server, remote="apon" means I am calling 5th line(i.e. https://github.com/Apon77) name="aex" means the name of repository which I wannt to sync (i.e. apon means https://github.com/Apon77 and name="aex" means aex repo of apon, so we are pointing to the repo https://github.com/Apon77/aex) revision="aex" means the branch of https://github.com/Apon77/aex we want to sync. So, it became equivalent to git clone https://github.com/Apon77/aex -b aex device/xiaomi/mido.
#Here, project path="kernel/xiaomi/mido" means where tree will sync in server, remote="dicky" means I am calling 13th line(i.e. https://github.com/Nicklas373) name="kernel_xiaomi_msm8953-4.9" means the name of repository which I wannt to sync (i.e. dicky means https://github.com/Nicklas373 and name="kernel_xiaomi_msm8953-4.9" means kernel_xiaomi_msm8953-4.9 repo of dicky, so we are pointing to the repo https://github.com/Nicklas373/kernel_xiaomi_msm8953-4.9) revision="lineage-17.1" means the branch of https://github.com/Nicklas373/kernel_xiaomi_msm8953-4.9 we want to sync. So, it became equivalent to git clone https://github.com/Nicklass373/kernel_xiaomi_msm8953-4.9 -b lineage-17.1 kernel/xiaomi/mido.
#Here, project path="vendor/xiaomi" means where tree will sync in server, remote="zeelog" means I am calling 9th line(i.e. https://github.com/zeelog) name="proprietary_vendor_xiaomi" means the name of repository which I wannt to sync (i.e. zeelog means https://github.com/zeelog and name="proprietary_vendor_xiaomi" means proprietary_vendor_xiaomi repo of zeelog, so we are pointing to the repo https://github.com/zeelog/proprietary_vendor_xiaomi) revision="lineage-18.1" means the branch of https://github.com/zeelog/proprietary_vendor_xiaomi we want to sync. So, it became equivalent to git clone https://github.com/zeelog/proprietary_vendor_xiaomi -b lineage-18.1 vendor/xiaomi.
